title: Reward distrubution
body: I havent seen anyone get rewards has it started or ended? How long are the waves

replies.body:
Hey there Teenage Riven,

According to my colleague's post, the rewards should be distributed by the end of **November 18th**. I'm afraid there are no additional information regarding the length of the waves currently. I'd keep an eye out on his post in case it gets updated with any additional information:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/6pbIXEEx-tldr-will-i-get-ranked-rewards-reward-distribution-on-going

> [{quoted}](name=Son Golin,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RWklQUkj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-11T22:18:53.233+0000)
>
> Hey there Teenage Riven,
> 
> According to my colleague's post, the rewards should be distributed by the end of **November 18th**. I'm afraid there are no additional information regarding the length of the waves currently. I'd keep an eye out on his post in case it gets updated with any additional information:
> 
> http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/6pbIXEEx-tldr-will-i-get-ranked-rewards-reward-distribution-on-going

Do you know if its going on right now?
